title: S&P 500 Records Worst Session In Over A Month, Meta And Microsoft Tumble: Greed Index Moves To 'Fear' Zone
text: The CNN Money Fear and Greed index showed a decline in the overall market sentiment, while the index moved to the “Fear” zone on Thursday.

title: Exclusive: Chinese researchers develop AI model for military use on back of Meta's Llama
text: Top Chinese research institutions linked to the People's Liberation Army have used Meta's publicly available Llama model to develop an AI tool for potential military applications, according to academic papers and analysts.

title: Nasdaq leads sell-off after Microsoft, Meta earnings prompt Big Tech slide
text: To get the latest market news check out finance.yahoo.com The Nasdaq led a tumble in US stocks on Thursday after Meta (META) and Microsoft (MSFT) earnings sparked worries about prospects for Big Techs amid rising artificial intelligence costs. The tech-heavy Nasdaq Composite (^IXIC) sank 2.7%, while the S&P 500 (^GSPC) fell nearly 1.9%, as both indexes ended the month slightly in the red.

title: Why Amazon stock gains on earnings, unlike Meta and Microsoft
text: Amazon (AMZN) reported better-than-expected third quarter results and delivered strong guidance. CFRA Research senior equity research analyst Arun Sundaram joins Market Domination Overtime Hosts Alexandra Canal and Josh Lipton to discuss the results and break down why the market is less concerned with Amazon's artificial intelligence (AI) spending compared to its peers.

title: Should Investors Consider Meta (META) or Snap's (SNAP) Stock After Q3 Earnings?
text: Reporting Q3 results on Wednesday, Meta Platforms (META) and Snap (SNAP) exceeded top and bottom line expectations but the social media leaders saw their stocks dip in today's trading session.

title: Stock Market Sells Off As Meta, Microsoft Slide; Apple, Amazon Report Earnings Late
text: The stock market sold off Thursday, as Wall Street reacted to reports from Meta and Microsoft. Apple and Amazon reported earnings late.

title: Meta Platforms: Don't Fret The AI Capex, Stay The Course
text: In light of its Q3 2024 report, Meta Platforms, Inc. stock plunged by over 5% in today's session, despite beating street estimates on top and bottom lines. With Q4 sales guidance falling a little short of estimates, Zuckerberg & Co. returning to free spending ways seems to be rocking the boat for some investors. However, Meta is delivering exceptional business performance, and remains an attractively valued cash printing machine!

title: Should You Forget Nvidia and Buy These 2 Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stocks Instead?
text: These dominant tech firms have long been leaders in the internet age.

title: A.I. Investments in Social Media: META vs SNAP
text: Meta Platforms (META) will double down in A.I. off promises to spend more on the technology.

title: Meta Warns of Worsening AI Losses
text: Wolfe Research Analyst Shweta Khajuria joins Caroline Hyde and Ed Ludlow to break down earnings results from Meta and Uber and what to expect from Amazon earnings coming out after the closing bell. She speaks on "Bloomberg Technology.

title: Meta Platforms: Strong Q3 Results And Amazing Growth Potential
text: Meta's Q3 2024 earnings beat EPS and revenue estimates, yet shares dropped ~3% in after-hours trading. Driven by AI advancements and better ad performance, Meta reported 20% revenue growth in constant currency, with ad impressions and price per ad also increasing. Meta Platforms' CapEx is set to increase significantly next year as it continues to invest in AI.

title: Can META's Solid Q3 Earnings Beat & AI Focus Push the Stock Higher?
text: Meta Platforms' third-quarter 2024 performance benefits from higher advertising revenues, expanding AI integration and a strong user base.

title: Meta and AMD Race to Meet Demand for AI With Infrastructure Push
text: Tech giants are pouring unprecedented resources into artificial intelligence (AI) infrastructure as Meta plans up to $40 billion in 2024 spending and AMD rides the wave to record $6.8 billion in revenue.

title: GelSight and Meta AI Introduce Digit 360 Tactile Sensor
text: WALTHAM, Mass.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--GelSight & Meta AI announced Digit 360, an artificial fingertip-shaped tactile sensor that delivers rich and detailed tactile data by digitizing touch.

title: Meta Platforms To Rally Around 33%? Here Are 10 Top Analyst Forecasts For Thursday
text: Top Wall Street analysts changed their outlook on these top names. For a complete view of all analyst rating changes, including upgrades and downgrades, please see our analyst ratings page.

title: Meta: Analyst says 'now is the time to buy'
text: Meta Platforms (META) shares move into negative territory on Thursday as investors weigh artificial intelligence (AI) spending concerns with the company's third quarter earnings beat. Roth Capital Partners managing director and senior research analyst Rohit Kulkarni joins Morning Brief hosts Julie Hyman and Brad Smith to discuss why he remains bullish on the stock and says now's the time to buy in at a discount.

title: Crude Oil Gains 1%; Meta Shares Fall Following Q3 Results
text: U.S. stocks traded lower midway through trading, with the Dow Jones index more than 300 points on Thursday.

title: Meta's Threads micro-blogging app now has 275 million monthly users, Zuckerberg says
text: Threads, Meta's rival to Elon Musk's X app, now has nearly 275 million monthly users, CEO Mark Zuckerberg said Wednesday. The latest numbers indicate Threads is up 175% from a year ago when it reached 100 million users.

title: Meta Fails to Impress Despite Q3 Earnings Beat: ETFs in Focus
text: Meta Platforms beats on both top and bottom lines but shares drop 3% in aftermarket hours on warnings of more spending.

title: Meta: CapEx 2025 Scares Investors On Halloween
text: The Family of Apps segment is stronger than ever and manages to largely cover the losses of the Reality of Labs. Llama is increasingly popular, Ray-Ban Meta AI are in wide demand, and Threads gets 1 million new subscribers a day. WhatsApp is growing fast in the U.S., as are young adults on Facebook. CapEx is expected to increase in 2025 but we do not know by how much, which is.

title: Meta already benefitting from AI but Microsoft still 'needs to find gold,' says DA Davidson's Luria
text: Gil Luria, DA Davidson managing director, joins CNBC's 'Money Movers' to discuss his buy rating on Meta, expectations for how AI will impact earnings, and more.

title: Meta Q3 '24 Earnings Update
text: Daily Active People (DAP) across Meta's Family of Apps decelerated to 20 mn QoQ in 3Q'24. Even though easy comp ended in 1Q'24 and 3Q'24 faced a fairly difficult comp, Meta posted quite strong YoY ad revenue growth rates across regions in 3Q'24. Revenue was +18.9% YoY; on a 2-yr and 3-yr CAGR basis, the company's top line increased by 21.0% and 11.8% respectively in the quarter.

title: Meta targets raised as analysts hail ad growth, bat off light forecast
text: Meta Platforms Inc (NASDAQ:META, ETR:FB2A, SWX:FB) has drawn repeated backing from analysts despite pointing to potentially slower revenue growth ahead in third-quarter results on Wednesday. Jefferies analysts noted guidance for revenue of $45-$48 billion, or a 12.2% to 19.7% increase, in the fourth quarter did suggest a “limited slowdown” against tougher comparables.

title: How 2 Big Tech Titans Are Faring After Earnings
text: Meta Platforms Inc (NASDAQ:META) and Microsoft Corp (NASDAQ:MSFT) are reeling after their highly anticipated earnings reports.

title: Nasdaq Index Under Pressure as Microsoft, Meta Earnings Disappoint Investors
text: Nasdaq falls as Microsoft, Meta miss earnings targets; Fed's stable inflation data adds to market uncertainty ahead of next rate decision.

title: Meta Platforms: Our Buy On Weakness Signal (Technical Analysis)
text: Meta Platforms has our most important Stocks In Demand or SID Buy Signal. Post earnings pullback will trigger our buy on weakness signals, targeting support at $560. We expect our signals like MACD and Chaikin Money Flow to turn up when buyers on weakness come back to Meta Platforms.

title: Meta Stock Could Pop If AI CapEx Accelerates Ad Revenue
text: There is something special about CEOs who start and run publicly traded companies. They have the creative spark, drive, and determination to keep placing bets on new growth opportunities.

title: Meta: The Valuation Makes No Sense (Rating Upgrade)
text: Meta Platforms reported better-than-expected Q3 earnings on both the top and bottom lines. The social media company is growing its revenues at double digits. Users, ARPU, and FCF are also all growing. I see upside revaluation potential given the strength in the advertising market. The fourth quarter is typically a strong quarter for ad spending.

title: Analysts revise META stock price target
text: Meta Platforms (NASDAQ: META), the parent company of Facebook and Instagram, is reaping the rewards of incorporating artificial intelligence into its products, as reflected in its Q3 results.

title: Trading the Earnings from Two Tech Giants: Meta and Microsoft
text: Wedbush's Joel Kulina breaks down the key takeaways from Meta and Microsoft's latest results.

title: Jefferies' Brent Thill on Microsoft & Meta earnings: AI expectations for investors got overinflated
text: Brent Thill, Jefferies tech research analyst, joins 'Squawk Box' to discuss Microsoft and Meta's quarterly earnings results, investor expectations for AI, and more.

title: Lion Trust: The market is overreacting to Meta's Q3, but Microsoft is a very different story
text: Storm Uru, fund manager at Lion Trust AM, discusses Meta and Microsoft's latest earnings, and why his firm has been trimming some tech holdings, as it's important to make that move into strength.

title: Meta: Zuckerberg 2.0 Still Getting A Lot Of Likes
text: Meta Platforms printed another strong quarter after the close today. META stock sold off a little in the immediate aftermath of earnings, but we remain bullish on the name in the medium term. We rate META stock at Hold with a price target of $676.

title: Engie to provide Meta with 260 MW of renewable energy from US solar plant
text: Engie has signed a deal with Facebook owner Meta Platforms for the U.S. social media group to buy 100% of the output from its U.S. Sypert solar power plant, the French utility said on Thursday.

title: Meta and Microsoft: AI's Spending Champs Won't Be Tapping the Brakes.
text: Sharply rising capital investments show no sign of slowing as the latest reports fail to excite investors.

title: Nvidia Stock Falls. Why Meta, Microsoft Earnings Are Giving Investors a Hallowe'en Fright.
text: Investors are fretting about how long the AI boom can last after the Big Tech companies forecast that their capital spending will carry on rising.

title: Meta user 'miss' wipes $56bn from the Facebook owner's value
text: A surprise fall in the active user base of Facebook and Instagram owner Meta Platforms Inc (NASDAQ:META, ETR:FB2A, SWX:FB) took the gloss off an otherwise solid set of quarterly numbers, wiping around 3.8% or $56 billion from the value of the business.  Q3h revenue climbed 19% year-over-year to $40.6 billion and earnings per share reached $6.03, both exceeding Wall Street expectations.
